question: Which is not an objectives of O-SMART (Ocean Services, Modelling, Applications, Resources and Technology) scheme of Ministry of Earth Sciences (MoES), Government of India?
option1: Regular update on marine living resources
option3: Develop technologies for marine bio resources
explanation:
The Ministry of Earth Sciences (MoES), Government of India came up with a new scheme named as O-SMART which acronym stands for -
O- Ocean
S- Services
M- Modelling
A- Application
R- Resources
T- Technology
The O-SMART scheme hold the following objectives -
1. To update continuously on Marine Living Resources in the Indian Exclusive Economic Zone(EEZ).
2. To monitor levels of sea water pollutants for coastal waters health assessment.
3. To develop new technologies for generating freshwater and tapping the marine bio resources.
